cards.front: What is the formula for finding the area between two curves y = f(x) and y = g(x)?
How do you calculate volume using the slicing (cross-section) method?
cards.back: $V = \int_a^b A(x) dx$, where $A(x)$ is the area of the cross-section at position x

cards.front: What is the disk method formula for finding volume of revolution around the x-axis?
cards.back: $V = \pi \int_a^b [R(x)]^2 dx$, where R(x) is the radius

cards.front: How do you use the washer method for volumes of revolution?
cards.back: $V = \pi \int_a^b \left([R(x)]^2 - [r(x)]^2\right) dx$, where R is outer radius, r is inner radius
